mapper.insert: insert into salary_sheet (id, operator, employee_id, remark, `state`, basic_salary, job_salary, commision, income_tax, insurance, fund) values (#{id}, #{operator}, #{employee_id}, #{remark}, #{`state`}, #{basic_salary}, #{job_salary}, #{commision}, #{income_tax}, #{insurance}, #{fund}) ;
mapper.select: select * from salary_sheet order by id desc limit 0,1 ;
